enTranslation.mainBunner.description: Jumla.com is the first Egyptian dropshipping platform that brings together the largest number of suppliers and marketers. It helps you sell online and make profits of more than 6000 pounds per month while you are in your place without having merchandise, store, or direct dealing with shipping companies, not even letting them collect your money.
enTranslation.auth.name: Name
enTranslation.about.description1: We provide you with more than 3000 different products sold in the online market with a large stock and new products at the cheapest wholesale price in Egypt, whether retail or wholesale
enTranslation.about.description2: The product you choose to sell will be in Jumla stores, we wrap it and deliver it to the shipping company, in order to save you store rental and labor for transportation and packaging.
enTranslation.about.description3: Don't worry about delivering the product because we are contracting with the largest shipping companies in Egypt to achieve the highest percentage of deliveries for your orders and build confidence in your customer.
enTranslation.about.description4: We will not only relieve you of the headache of storage and delivery, we will also be responsible for collecting the product from the customer during the delivery of the order, and we will transfer your profits to you.
